scripts.dev:backend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w backend run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:8787/api/health && node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w frontend run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:backend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w backend run build
scripts.build:frontend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w frontend run build
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:backend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w backend run test
scripts.test:frontend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w frontend run test
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w backend run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: node scripts/with-node24.mjs -- npm -w frontend run lint
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
